name: Dominoes Battle: The Best Game
description:
Duel, wherever and whenever you want, on Dominoes Battle!


- Set up matches and challenge your friends and family or try to defeat the robots with reasoning, attitude and a dash of luck. Even better... challenge others players from anywhere in the world!

- Ranking with multiple categories! Keep playing to always stay in the top positions!

- Customize tables and tiles with a lot of different options!

- Unlockable emojis!

- 4 different Dominos modes: Choose your favorite mode Turbo, Draw, All Fives and Block. 100% free!

- Matches with 2 or 4 players: choose whether to set a match with only 2 or 4 players. Available both single or multiplayer!


Other amazing features:

- Soft currency and level system!

- Special events: win all matches without spending your life and receive prizes as you progress!

- Wheel of Fortune! Believe in the power of luck ... anything is possible!

- Add in-game friends and challenge them!

- Async mode with friends: play a Turbo game against the robot and challenge your friend to play the same game you played. Whoever gets the highest score wins! Who's the Master!?


What are you waiting for? Download free now, challenge, have fun and show that you are the best in Dominoes Battle!
developers: Gazeus Fun Mobile Games For Free
publishers: Gazeus Fun Mobile Games for Free
